text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int sum = 0 , i , n , arr [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( arr [ i ] < arr [ i + 1 ] ) sum += arr [ i ] ; else sum += arr [ i + 1 ] ; } printf ( "%d" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
